metadata.title: CVE-2023-52426 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: libexpat through 2.5.0 allows recursive XML Entity Expansion if XML_DTD isundefined at compile time.

criterions.comment: expat package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
swish-e package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
insighttoolkit4 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
cadaver package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
matanza package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
tdom package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
libxmltok package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
